title: The Letters of Robert Louis Stevenson - Volume 2
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: But whether to call the story BLAIR OF BALMYLE, or whether to call it THE YOUNG CHEVALIER, I have not yet decided.

title: The Letters of Robert Louis Stevenson - Volume 2
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: I got the name of my hero out of Brown - Blair of Balmyle - Francie Blair.

title: The novels and tales of Robert Louis Stevenson.
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: But whether to call the story Blair of Balmyle, or whether to call it The Young Cbevalier I have not yet decided.
